snippet: India’s new budget, released Thursday, has set aside $33 million for a statue of an independence leader, Vallabhbhai Patel, that will be almost twice the size of the Statue of Liberty.
lead_paragraph: India’s new budget, released Thursday, has set aside $33 million for a statue of an independence leader, Vallabhbhai Patel, that will be almost twice the size of the Statue of Liberty.

headline.main: India: Millions Set Aside for Statue
headline.print_headline: India: Millions Set Aside for Statue
